name: Jiro and a Chaotic Necromancer
description:
Welcome to this game. Its about a slime (Jiro) who has to defeat a necromancer after he pisses it off.  Unfortunately, there is no audio to this game since I didn't have any time. There are some bugs and unpolished elements here and there but it is playable.  I hope you enjoy it and can have a smile or a laugh out of it. Even if you don't, thanks for taking the time to try it out!

Controls

W,A,S,D to move or arrow keys

Space to interact

Characters that are interactable have bubbles above them.

Ps: In case it was confusing, the counters show how many mobs to kill to leave the area and you can leave after reaching that amount.
